title: aphex twin project
desc: I was tasked to output data through a web application, using React. I decided to make a visualization depicting four of my favorite Aphex Twin albums, along with the tracklist/description of the chosen album, along with playable tracks.

title: landing page
desc: As a personal project, I took it upon myself to create a landing page that followed the layout of CMS's, such as Carrd.co or LinkTree, that allow you to create simple landing pages using premade HTML and CSS components. I created this in a day, but decided that I wanted a nice animation in the background, so I used p5.js to accomplish that (which took another day for configurations).
